channel.title: Chart-scap3
channel.description:
Hello I am [i][b][i]BACK![/i][/b][/i] LOL :| But i am going to start back to release my server i want 300 post and ill release it. Here are a few updates:
Updates 1) Added new training area 2) Put training area as [b]SafeZone[/b] 3) Added Full Wc 4) You now get money for Wc 5) Full smithing (not like rs) 6) harder training (Not to hard ;D ) 7) Wc for new people at the training place 8) Pkers are unable to come back in the training place 9) Walls added 10) errors fixed 11) Trying to add specials 12) Black armor cost 800mil+ 13) White armor cost 800mil+ 14) Command added for owner to go to training place
Working on- Adding a shop for new people
Shops: In the high lv training spot Also in the bank
Pictures coming soon :)

item.title: Chart-scap3
item.dc:creator: @doggiedoo86 doggiedoo86
item.description:
@doggiedoo86 wrote:

Great, I need help lol… I want to add a NPC to talk when i click on “Talk” could you help me where do i add it i have:

     case 14604: // QUEST TAKE PURE ESS
        if(playerHasItemAmount(7936, 1)) {
        deleteItem(7936, getItemSlot(7936), 1);
        showInterface(3559);
        NpcDialogue = 0;
        break;
        }
        else {
        sendFrame126(GetNpcName(NpcTalkTo), 0943);
        sendFrame126("", 0943);
        sendFrame126("Good, You got me that pure ess!", 4904);
        sendFrame126("Now go find me A Red Spice (4)", 4905);
        sendFrame126("", 4906);
        sendFrame75(NpcTalkTo, 4901);
        sendFrame164(4900);
        NpcDialogueSend = true;
        break;
        }
     case 14604: // QUEST TAKE SPICE
        if(playerHasItemAmount(7480, 1)) {
        deleteItem(7480, getItemSlot(7480), 1);
        showInterface(3559);
        NpcDialogue = 0;
        break;
        }
        else {
        sendFrame126(GetNpcName(NpcTalkTo), 0943);
        sendFrame126("", 0943);
        sendFrame126("Good, You got me that pure ess!", 4904);
        sendFrame126("Now go find me A Red Spice (4)", 4905);
        sendFrame126("", 4906);
        sendFrame75(NpcTalkTo, 4901);
        sendFrame164(4900);
        NpcDialogueSend = true;
        break;
        }
     case 14604: // QUEST TAKE SPICE
        if(playerHasItemAmount(7480, 1)) {
        deleteItem(7480, getItemSlot(7480), 1);
        showInterface(3559);
        NpcDialogue = 0;
        break;
        }

So far where do i add these?

New update command added for owner!

Read full topic
